languages.text: "Что бы там ни было... уже не важно". {n}Сенешаль вздыхает.{/n} "Ваш поступок, {name}, граничит с безумием... или святостью. За вами словно проход открылся: там, где пламя секунду назад бушевало — вдруг одни угли тусклые... хотя что я несу! Показалось мне, дымом надышался — были бы у вас такие раны, если бы огонь вас не тронул!"

traits.locale_text: "Что бы там ни было... уже не важно". {n}Сенешаль вздыхает.{/n} "Ваш поступок, {name}, граничит с безумием... или святостью. За вами словно проход открылся: там, где пламя секунду назад бушевало — вдруг одни угли тусклые... хотя что я несу! Показалось мне, дымом надышался — были бы у вас такие раны, если бы огонь вас не тронул!"

languages.text: "Whatever it was... it matters no longer." {n}Abelard sighs.{/n} "Your conduct, {name}, is bordering on madness... or holiness. A path opened behind you. Where one moment there was fire, the next only smouldering embers remained... but what am I saying? My eyes must have deceived me — too much smoke for my lungs! Truly, would you have received wounds like these if there had been no fire?"
languages.original_text: "Что бы там ни было... уже не важно". {n}Сенешаль вздыхает.{/n} "Ваш поступок, {name}, граничит с безумием... или святостью. За вами словно проход открылся: там, где пламя секунду назад бушевало — вдруг одни угли тусклые... хотя что я несу! Показалось мне, дымом надышался — были бы у вас такие раны, если бы огонь вас не тронул!"

Where one moment there was fire, the next only smouldering embers remained... but what am I saying? My eyes must have deceived me — too much smoke for my lungs! Truly, would you have received wounds like these if there had been no fire?"

Where one moment there was fire, the next only smouldering embers remained... but what am I saying? My eyes must have deceived me — too much smoke for my lungs! Truly, would you have received wounds like these if there had been no fire?"

languages.text: “虽然不知道那究竟是什么……但那已经不重要了。”{n}阿贝拉德叹了口气。{/n}“{name}，您刚刚的行为接近于疯狂……或是神圣。刚刚，您的身后出现了一条道路。明明那里前一刻还在燃烧，但后一刻就只剩下冒着烟的余烬……可我这是在说什么胡话呢？我的眼睛肯定是出了问题，肯定是我肺里吸进了太多烟！说真的，如果那里真的没有火，您怎么可能会受这么重的伤呢？”
languages.original_text: "Whatever it was... it matters no longer." {n}Abelard sighs.{/n} "Your conduct, {name}, is bordering on madness... or holiness. A path opened behind you. Where one moment there was fire, the next only smouldering embers remained... but what am I saying? My eyes must have deceived me — too much smoke for my lungs! Truly, would you have received wounds like these if there had been no fire?"

traits.locale_text: “虽然不知道那究竟是什么……但那已经不重要了。”{n}阿贝拉德叹了口气。{/n}“{name}，您刚刚的行为接近于疯狂……或是神圣。刚刚，您的身后出现了一条道路。明明那里前一刻还在燃烧，但后一刻就只剩下冒着烟的余烬……可我这是在说什么胡话呢？我的眼睛肯定是出了问题，肯定是我肺里吸进了太多烟！说真的，如果那里真的没有火，您怎么可能会受这么重的伤呢？”

languages.text: «Fuera lo que fuera... ya no importa». {n}Abelard suspira.{/n} «Su conducta, {name}, raya en la locura... o la santidad. A su paso se abrió un camino. Donde antes había fuego, solo quedaban ascuas humeantes... pero ¿qué digo? Mis ojos deben de haberme jugado una mala pasada; ¡demasiado humo para mis pulmones! ¿Habría sufrido esas heridas de no haber tocado el fuego?».
languages.original_text: "Whatever it was... it matters no longer." {n}Abelard sighs.{/n} "Your conduct, {name}, is bordering on madness... or holiness. A path opened behind you. Where one moment there was fire, the next only smouldering embers remained... but what am I saying? My eyes must have deceived me — too much smoke for my lungs! Truly, would you have received wounds like these if there had been no fire?"

traits.locale_text: «Fuera lo que fuera... ya no importa». {n}Abelard suspira.{/n} «Su conducta, {name}, raya en la locura... o la santidad. A su paso se abrió un camino. Donde antes había fuego, solo quedaban ascuas humeantes... pero ¿qué digo? Mis ojos deben de haberme jugado una mala pasada; ¡demasiado humo para mis pulmones! ¿Habría sufrido esas heridas de no haber tocado el fuego?».

languages.text: 「あれが何であったとしても…もう問題ではありません」{n}アベラルドはため息をつく。{/n}「{name}様、あなたの行為は狂気か…神聖かの境界にあります。あなたの後ろに道が開けました。一瞬、炎があったのに、次の瞬間にはくすぶっている残り火だけが残っていました…我は一体何を言っているのでしょう？この目が自分を騙したに違いません。肺に煙が充満しました！本当に、炎がなかったら、こんな傷を負っていたでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "Whatever it was... it matters no longer." {n}Abelard sighs.{/n} "Your conduct, {name}, is bordering on madness... or holiness. A path opened behind you. Where one moment there was fire, the next only smouldering embers remained... but what am I saying? My eyes must have deceived me — too much smoke for my lungs! Truly, would you have received wounds like these if there had been no fire?"

traits.locale_text: 「何であったとしても…もう問題でない」{n}アベラルドはため息をつく。{/n}あなたの行為は{name}狂気か…神聖かの境目だ。あなたの後ろに道が開けた。一瞬火があったのに、次の瞬間にはくすぶっている残り火だけが残った…でも、私は何を言ってるんだ？私の目は私を騙したに違いない。肺に煙が充満した！本当に、火事がなかったら、こんな傷を負わなかったでしょう？」

「あれが何であったとしても…もう問題ではありません」{n}アベラルドはため息をつく。{/n}「{name}様、あなたの行為は狂気か…神聖かの境界にあります。あなたの後ろに道が開けました。一瞬、炎があったのに、次の瞬間にはくすぶっている残り火だけが残っていました…我は一体何を言っているのでしょう？この目が自分を騙したに違いません。肺に煙が充満しました！本当に、炎がなかったら、こんな傷を負っていたでしょうか？」

languages.original_text: "Whatever it was... it matters no longer." {n}Abelard sighs.{/n} "Your conduct, , is bordering on madness... or holiness. A path opened behind you. Where one moment there was fire, the next only smouldering embers remained... but what am I saying? My eyes must have deceived me — too much smoke for my lungs! Truly, would you have received wounds like these if there had been no fire?"

languages.text: « Je ne sais pas ce que c'était... mais ça n'a plus d'importance, {n}dit Abélard avec un soupir.{/n} {name}, votre comportement est à deux doigts de la démence... ou du mysticisme. Une voie s'est ouverte derrière vous. En une seconde, les flammes ont laissé place à des braises fumantes... Mais qu'est-ce que je raconte ? Mes yeux ont dû me jouer des tours... Et puis toute cette fumée dans mes poumons ! Vous n'auriez jamais subi de telles blessures s'il n'y avait pas eu de flammes. »
languages.original_text: "Whatever it was... it matters no longer." {n}Abelard sighs.{/n} "Your conduct, {name}, is bordering on madness... or holiness. A path opened behind you. Where one moment there was fire, the next only smouldering embers remained... but what am I saying? My eyes must have deceived me — too much smoke for my lungs! Truly, would you have received wounds like these if there had been no fire?"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne sais pas ce que c'était... mais ça n'a plus d'importance, {n}dit Abélard avec un soupir.{/n} {name}, votre comportement est à deux doigts de la démence... ou du mysticisme. Une voie s'est ouverte derrière vous. En une seconde, les flammes ont laissé place à des braises fumantes... Mais qu'est-ce que je raconte ? Mes yeux ont dû me jouer des tours... Et puis toute cette fumée dans mes poumons ! Vous n'auriez jamais subi de telles blessures s'il n'y avait pas eu de flammes. »

languages.text: "Was immer es war ... es spielt keine Rolle mehr." {n}Abelard seufzt.{/n} "Euer Verhalten, {name}, grenzt an Wahnsinn ... oder Heiligkeit. Hinter Euch öffnete sich ein Weg. Erst war da Feuer und im nächsten Augenblick nur noch rauchende Asche ... aber was sage ich da? Meine Augen müssen mich getäuscht haben – zu viel Rauch in meinen Lungen! Doch hättet Ihr Wunden wie diese erhalten, wenn da kein Feuer gewesen wäre?"
languages.original_text: "Whatever it was... it matters no longer." {n}Abelard sighs.{/n} "Your conduct, {name}, is bordering on madness... or holiness. A path opened behind you. Where one moment there was fire, the next only smouldering embers remained... but what am I saying? My eyes must have deceived me — too much smoke for my lungs! Truly, would you have received wounds like these if there had been no fire?"

traits.locale_text: "Was immer es war ... es spielt keine Rolle mehr." {n}Abelard seufzt.{/n} "Euer Verhalten, {name}, grenzt an Wahnsinn ... oder Heiligkeit. Hinter Euch öffnete sich ein Weg. Erst war da Feuer und im nächsten Augenblick nur noch rauchende Asche ... aber was sage ich da? Meine Augen müssen mich getäuscht haben – zu viel Rauch in meinen Lungen! Doch hättet Ihr Wunden wie diese erhalten, wenn da kein Feuer gewesen wäre?"

languages.text: "Her ne idiyse... Artık bir önemi yok." {n}Abelard iç çekiyor.{/n} "Davranışlarınız {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}, ya deliliğin ya da kutsallığın sınırında geziyor. Arkanızda bir geçit açıldı. Bir an yangının olduğu yerde, bir an sonra sadece için için yanan korlar kaldı... Neler diyorum ben? Gözlerim beni yanılttı herhâlde. Ciğerlerime dolan dumandandır kesin! Hem ortada ateş olmasa böyle yaralar alır mıydınız?"
languages.original_text: "Whatever it was... it matters no longer." {n}Abelard sighs.{/n} "Your conduct, {name}, is bordering on madness... or holiness. A path opened behind you. Where one moment there was fire, the next only smouldering embers remained... but what am I saying? My eyes must have deceived me — too much smoke for my lungs! Truly, would you have received wounds like these if there had been no fire?"

traits.locale_text: "Her ne idiyse... Artık bir önemi yok." {n}Abelard iç çekiyor.{/n} "Davranışlarınız {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}, ya deliliğin ya da kutsallığın sınırında geziyor. Arkanızda bir geçit açıldı. Bir an yangının olduğu yerde, bir an sonra sadece için için yanan korlar kaldı... Neler diyorum ben? Gözlerim beni yanılttı herhâlde. Ciğerlerime dolan dumandandır kesin! Hem ortada ateş olmasa böyle yaralar alır mıydınız?"
